title: Apple Shop Leader, Rotterdam (p-t, fixed term)
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — we craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it.
description: The ASC has the following responsibilities to fulfill as they relate to four key areas: Customer, In-store Merchandising, Staff Management, Apple Corporate/Manager
key_qualifications: Validated experience in a retail environment or recent graduate with extraordinary customer service skills. Adaptive and solutions-based approach to business management. You truly love connecting with customers and helping them understand technology on a human level. And more...
education_experience: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience preferred.
